CURRENT DRIVE We're excited to announce that all money raised this year will benefit KnowledgeBeat. KnowledgeBeat is dedicated to furthering education in rural areas of Africa with an initial focus on Zambia. Through programs that bring children and communities enhanced educational resources and opportunities, they are improving quality of life and laying a foundation for Africa’s future. More information can be found at: www.knowledgebeat.org.
Website: www.hopscotchnetwork.org
ABOUT HOPSCOTCH NETWORK Hopscotch Network is a growing network of young professionals and students who want a fun and unique way to make an impact in their local communities. With a focus on improving the lives of underprivileged children, Hopscotch organizes social and volunteer events to build a national community of philanthropic young people, and raise capital or needy organizations who share our vision.
OUR MISSION Help underprivileged children by raising funds and offering needed services for partner non-profits committed to the advancement of underprivileged children Mobilize a powerful group of young adults who have the shared desire to support children Provide this group of young adults with a social outlet and network to form meaningful and lasting relationships
MEANS TO AN END Our chapters host networking and fundraising events across the US. These events raise funds to create an immediate and meaningful impact on the nonprofit we are partnering with on our current drive. We also seek to provide members access to a powerful group of young adults who are not only social, but are socially aware.
1. All children should be offered the opportunity to thrive in a global society.
2. Younger generations must become more socially active and socially responsible.
3. Young adults can and should make a material impact on the world through benevolent nonprofit work.
cause.mission: Aid underprivileged children while creating an outlet for young adults to give charitably, improve the community through service, and promote social activism.
